definition: to act cute/putting on adorable airs/to pretend to be lovely
adornment/to adorn/dress/clothing/costume (of an actor in a play)/to play a role/to pretend/to install/to fix/to wrap (sth in a bag)/to load/to pack
can/may/able to/to approve/to permit/to suit/(particle used for emphasis) certainly/very
to love/to be fond of/to like/affection/to be inclined (to do sth)/to tend to (happen)
(typically followed by 就[jiu4]) apt to (lose one's temper, catch a cold etc)/at the drop of a hat
to lift sth up/to elevate sb/to honor sb (with compliments, gifts, promotions etc)/to show great regard/to speak highly/Taiwan pr. [tai2 ju3]
to make trouble without reason (idiom); to be deliberately provocative
to act in a fit of pique/to get in a huff/to be peeved
at one's wit's end/unable to find a way out
cannot bear to see/to hate/to dislike/to disapprove
